name: 李達生
objective:
控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design
schedule:
1. Thermodynamic & energy efficiency
2. Reynolds Transport Theorem & fluid dynamics
3. Governing equations of HVAC systems
4-8. Classic control theories
9. 期中考
10. Smart air conditioner 
11. Smart valve & chiller system 
12. Inverter control 
13-16. Modern control & AI
17-18. 期末報告
scorePolicy:
作業 50%
期中考 25%
期末報告 25%
materials: 逐周發放上課講義 PPT 檔案
consultation: Line 群組線上諮詢每周二下午 (待定) 610 室實體諮詢
remarks: 6. 可負擔能源 本課程教授 AI 如何用於 HVAC 節能，使能源使用量下降以達可負擔之目標
